sources.title: Lady from Chungking
sources.description: After the Japanese invade China in WW 2, a young woman (Anna May Wong) leads a band of partisans against the occupying troops.

sources.title: Lady From Chungking
sources.description: Lady from Chungking Anna May Wong, Harold Huber, Mae Clark 1942 PRC

sources.title: Lady from Chungking (1942) ANNA MAY WONG
sources.description:
Stars: Anna May Wong, Harold Huber, Mae Clark
 Director: William Nigh

 After the Japanese invade China in WWII, a young woman leads a band of partisans against the occupying troops.

metadata.Plot: In Japanese-occupied China, Madame Kwan Mei is the leader of a resistance organization based in a rural village. When two American airmen are shot down near the village, she makes plans to rescue them and have them help her organization. Then, when Japanese General Kaimura arrives in the village, she realizes that a major operation is imminent. She decides to impersonate an aristocrat, in order to win the general's confidence and learn his plans.
metadata.Actors: Anna May Wong, Harold Huber, Mae Clarke
